name: Cookie Clicker (itch) (MB832)
description:
It's Clicker Game

Buy upgrades from the shop by pressing space typing in the number in the list of the upgrade you want to buy

To Save your Game:

Press Space then type in "Save". It will give you your Save Code. Click out of the List to Return to the Game

To Load your Save Code:

Press in Space type in "Load". Then Paste in your Save Code. And you will Return to the Game
